name: Hop The Ground
description:
Hop on top of football grounds and know their locations to get medals and complete leagues!

Controls

  • W/A/S/D - move
  • LMB - choose answer
  • Spacebar - jump
  • U - toggle music on/off
  • Esc - quit to main menu

Tip: if you experience bad mouse behaviour (reported for Firefox), try a different browser (i.e. Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge) or the Windows version.
